articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: Trump threatens to slap 25% tariffs on EU, says bloc was always meant to hurt the U.S. - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to impose 25% tariffs on imports from the European Union, claiming that the bloc was formed "to screw" the U.S.
articles.content:
U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to impose 25% tariffs on imports from the European Union, claiming that the economic and political bloc was formed "to screw" the U.S.
